author: Jake Thomas
title: 19 Austin Cops Indicted in Crowd-Control Injuries at George Floyd Protests
description: Prosecutors in Texas' capital city released documents describing charges against police officers. Critics say the move is political.
content: Austin, Texas, police officers face criminal charges for allegedly leaving protesters with serious head and body injuries after firing "beanbag" rounds into crowds during the George Floyd protests thâ€¦ [+3967 chars]
